TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridView extends System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class GridView Inherits ViewBase Implements IAddChild
public ref class GridView : System::Windows::Controls::ViewBase, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type GridView = class inherit ViewBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 表示一种视图模式，该模式以列的形式显示 控件的数据项。

span.span: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类及其支持类提供用于显示为指定的数据项的基础结构一系列的列中的控件。The class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a control in a series of columns. 这些列具有列标题，这两个派生自的按钮，并可以通过使用拖放操作的列重新排序。The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from , and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations. 请注意，列的显示数据并不提供直接访问权限的数据源。Note that the columns of a display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data. 若要指定的视图模式，请设置属性设置为对象。To specify a as the view mode for a , set the property to a object. 类派生自。The class is derived from . 可以通过继承定义自定义视图为视图提供支持的元素的类。You can define custom views by inheriting from the class that provides the supporting elements for a view. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 为 ListView 创建自定义视图模式](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md). 下图显示的示例，它使用。The following illustration shows an example of a that uses a . ![具有 GridView 输出的 ListView](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "具有 GridView 输出的 ListView")![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") 中的列定义为对象。The columns in a are defined as objects. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，可以定义对象的子元素作为。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define objects as child elements of the . 在代码中，可以添加到通过使用属性和方法为定义类。In code, you can add a to the by using the property and the method that is defined for the class. 同样，您可以使用其他等方法并若要修改的列中。Similarly, you can use other methods such as and to modify the columns in a . 下面的示例演示如何定义的列。The following example shows how to define the columns of a . [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)] 若要设置样式中的行，定义的样式中的控件。To style the rows in a , define a style for the controls in the . 添加可视元素，例如或控件，为，使用模板或样式。To add visual elements, such as a or control, to a , use templates or styles. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 使用 CheckBox 创建 Listviewitem](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md)。For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义实现控件作为其。The following example shows how to define a control that implements a as its . [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用于列标题的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.

value.span: 用于定义列标题的显示属性的 。

span.span: The that is used to define the display properties for column headers.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和同时用于定义的可视化树的属性表示列标题中的对象。The property and the property are both used to define the visual tree for the objects that represent the column headers in a . 属性还可以定义列标题时内容未通过定义通过指定为对象。The property can also define column header content when a is not by specified by defining a for the object. 此属性表示多种方式来布置和设置列标题的样式之一。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 当您设置样式时，有一些限制。When you set styles, there are some restrictions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果 的列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果 的列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或属性设置，则将忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 多个属性可用于指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置多个属性，将使用具有最高优先级的属性的值格式的列标题。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在几种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示可用于设置列标题，按从最低到最高优先级的顺序排列的格式的属性：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你未设置此属性，将使用默认逻辑如果已定义的所有列的属性。If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the property for all columns if it is defined. 如果属性和都设置了属性，属性优先。If the property and the property are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性表示多种方式来布置和设置列标题的样式之一。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用在此只读的静态属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过将其静态值分配给另一个属性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具体而言，此属性的静态值定义用于查找默认的资源键样式。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style of a . 若要重新定义此样式，引用通过使用[X:static 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)，并将该值作为分配[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)新。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用在此只读的静态属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过将其静态值分配给另一个属性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具体而言，此属性的静态值定义用于查找默认的资源键样式。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style. 若要重新定义此样式，引用通过使用[X:static 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)，并将该值作为分配[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)新。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new . 可以使用在此只读属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]作为[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)的的重新定义为。You can use this read-only property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of a that redefines the for the .
